+      required: true,
+      unique: true,

     password: { type: String, required: true, minlength: 6 },

+      type: String,
+      enum: ["528", "928", "Praecipe"],
+      required: false,
+      default: "528",
+    },
     documentRequirements: {
       type: documentSchema,
       required: function () {
         return this.documentLabel === "528";

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -19,16 +19,27 @@
 const userSchema = new mongoose.Schema(
   {
     fullNames: { type: String, required: true, trim: true },
     familyName: { type: String, required: true, trim: true },
-    email: { type: String, required: true, unique: true, lowercase: true, trim: true },
+    email: {
+      type: String,
+      required: true,
+      unique: true,
+      lowercase: true,
+      trim: true,
+    },
     password: { type: String, required: true, minlength: 6 },
     gfgNumber: { type: String, required: true },
-    documentLabel: { type: String, enum: ["528", "928", "Praecipe"], required: false, default: "528" },
+    documentLabel: {
+      type: String,
+      enum: ["528", "928", "Praecipe"],
+      required: false,
+      default: "528",
+    },
     documentRequirements: {
-      type: documentSchema,
-      required: function () {
-        return this.documentLabel === "528";
+      documentRequirements: {
+        type: documentSchema,
+        required: false, // ‚Üê make it optional unconditionally
       },
     },
     profileImage: { type: String }, // file path string
   },
